Requirement Description: The Name Server is supplied with a Domain Name and shall return either the Resource Location, or the Address of another Name Server.
The Name Server must return data in a timely manner.
The Name Server must not use any stale data.
The Name Server must be capable of being supplied with the Address of a resource and then returning the Domain Name, or the Address of another Domain Server
The Name Server must be capable of understanding Domain Names that are supplied in the DNS Protocol Format.
The Name Server must be capable of being updated periodically with more current information.
